name: Beaches
description: Sun-kissed sands and turquoise waters await. Discover our curated collection of stunning beachfront hotels and resorts. Whether you're looking for a vibrant party spot or a tranquil escape, find your perfect coastal getaway here.

name: Mountains
description: Breathe in the crisp mountain air. From cozy lodges to luxury resorts, discover hotels with breathtaking views of majestic peaks and serene valleys. Your high-altitude getaway starts here.

name: Heritage
description: Step back in time and live like royalty. Stay in magnificent palaces, colonial-era bungalows, and historic havelis that narrate tales of a bygone era. Experience history, luxury, and culture combined.

name: Wildlife
description: Embark on an adventure into the wild. Stay at jungle lodges and resorts on the fringes of national parks, offering a perfect blend of comfort and the thrill of spotting majestic creatures in their natural habitat.

name: Adventure
description: For the thrill-seekers and adrenaline junkies. Discover hotels that serve as a base for trekking, skiing, rafting, and other exciting adventure sports that get your heart racing.

name: Spiritual
description: Embark on a journey of inner peace and discovery. Find serene hotels and resorts near major pilgrimage sites and spiritual centers, perfect for contemplation, meditation, and rejuvenation.

name: Wellness
description: Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul. Our collection of wellness resorts offers serene environments, world-class spas, yoga retreats, and holistic treatments for a truly restorative getaway.

name: Weddings
description: Find the perfect venue for your dream wedding. From grand palaces and heritage forts to pristine beaches and lush gardens, explore our curated collection of hotels that make for a magical wedding destination.

name: Desert
description: Explore the magic and majesty of the desert. From luxurious desert resorts to authentic camps under the stars, discover stays that offer unforgettable experiences like camel safaris, cultural nights, and stargazing.

name: Boutique
description: Discover unique and intimate hotels with personalized service. Our collection of boutique hotels offers one-of-a-kind experiences, distinctive design, and a strong sense of place for the discerning traveler.

name: Luxury Tents
description: Experience the glamour of camping with all the comforts of a luxury hotel. Our selection of luxury tents and glamping sites offers a unique way to connect with nature without sacrificing style or comfort.

name: Milestone Celebrations
description: Celebrate your special occasions in memorable settings. Whether it's an anniversary, a birthday, or any significant milestone, find the perfect hotel to make your celebration extraordinary.

name: Honeymoon
description: Begin your new life together in a fairytale setting. Explore our curated collection of romantic hotels and resorts that offer the perfect backdrop for your honeymoon, with intimate experiences and unforgettable memories.
